text: Allahvutaiya pokkisankal (anaittum) ennitam irukkinrana enrum nan unkalitam kuravillai; nan maraivanavarrai arintavanum allan; nan oru vanavar enrum kuravillai. Evarkalai unkal kankal ilivakak kankinranavo avarkalukku allah oru nanmaiyum alikka mattan enrum nan kuramatten. Avarkal ullattil ulla (nampikkai, nallennam akiyavarrai unkalaivita) allahtan mikavum arintavan. (Itarku maraka nan kurinal) niccayamaka nanum aniyayakkararkalil oruvanaki vituven'' (enrum kurinar)
